body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good afternoon, my name is Harold Robinson, and I am with Prestige Furniture Store. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, hello. My name is Cynthia Murphy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, Ms. Murphy. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm a bit nervous. I received a message that there was a security issue with the payment method I used for my last purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Cynthia. For your security, can you please provide the last four digits of the payment card you used?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And just for verification, what is the billing zip code associated with this card?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's nine zero zero one seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Cynthia. I'll look into this issue immediately. In the meantime, could you tell me more about what makes you feel nervous?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Mainly, I'm worried about unauthorized charges and how this might affect my personal information security.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can assure you that we take these matters very seriously. I'll personally ensure that your details are safe and inform you about the steps we're taking to secure your information.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Harold. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Cynthia. It's our priority to make sure you feel supported and safe. Thank you for your time today, and please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any more questions or concerns. Have a great day!
